name: obsidian-mcp-macros
description: MCP functionality for custom user scripts written in JS

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp ./main.js ~/Documents/Obsidian/Vaults/The\ Lab\ v2/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-mcp-macros/ && cp ./manifest.json ~/Documents/Obsidian/Vaults/The\ Lab\ v2/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-mcp-macros/
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
